website_summaries.verdict: Provides several hours of working light after an all-day charge in the sun or by USB.
pros: Offers an extremely bright LED that can project the light up to several hundred feet
Uses a magnet to attach itself to metal objects for convenience
Includes seatbelt cutter and window shatter tool for emergencies
cons: Solar power charging option is much slower than USB

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight not working
customer_reviews.text: I've had this flashlight for 5 months and the flashlight part stopped working. Wrote to company but have gotten no response and they claim to have a 2 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool for car
customer_reviews.text: Great car addition. The magnet allows me to stick it right under the driver seat it sticks to the metal tracks underneath for easy access. All the functions worked well when I tested them and it charged right up.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I was waiting for!
customer_reviews.text: Great compact and multifunction design ideal for emergencies. [UPDATE January 19, 2020] I need to buy another NPET flashlight model "T10-1" (500 Lumens), but when trying to look for it on Amzon.com all products are redirected to the sales page of the basic model "T09" (which has a compass and has no alarm, nor Red and Blue strobe lights) with "mixed reviews" of the three models (T09, T10, T10-1). Could someone please indicate when they will place the "NPET T10-1" model back on sale?
customer_reviews.author: maromero

customer_reviews.title: This flashlight is the one you need !!
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is just right. It is not to big or small. Very sturdy made and I checked all functions of the light. Works great. This is the one for emergencies. I love the usb connection. Charging in a power outage is great. Side light is very handy also. It puts out even bright light. The front head lamp has a more focused beam which is excellent for close up and far away night use. Overall I highly recommended this product. I will buy another one for auto and house emergency situations.
customer_reviews.author: Doug tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money, may buy more
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1 for my wife's car, and it looks reasonably well built, and has enough features (rechargeable batteries, seat belt cutter, window smasher, LED lights, and magnet to attach to metal) to make it a good value for the money. So I may buy one for each member of our family as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not working 6 months later
customer_reviews.text: Changing from 5 star to one star. Purchased on July 15, 2018, and the end light stopped working less than six months later. Also today the wrist strap popped off. I've been too busy and too sick to deal with it until now. If the seller resolves this problem I will change my rating again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: not a bright light
customer_reviews.text: good "idea" but this light is not bright. I have found others just like this unit that is MUCH brighter. returned unit, will spend the couple dollars more to get a brighter light.
customer_reviews.author: Funtimes2012

customer_reviews.title: Quite innovative
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the flash light of the future...I can see the next model connecting to the internet!
customer_reviews.author: Torrentialrains

customer_reviews.title: Headlamp doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, after finally finding the correct attachment to charge this, the headlamp doesn't work. All of the other features seem to work, but I cannot carry this as an emergency tool if the Headlamp does not even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, I did a 1yr test and it failed after a few months
customer_reviews.text: After being exposed to sunlight it started to go from black to bronze. And after letting it fall from my seat to the floor mat the button got jamed to change modes constantly and I could not stop it till it it died. And even then it still does not work right anymore
customer_reviews.author: Blake R.

customer_reviews.title: love it especially rechargeable in wall or solar
customer_reviews.text: i bought the t10 after t09 prefer charge at base on 09 I like 09model which micro usb plugs in base usb in wall t10 is opposite wall plug adapter I have are usb not micro so I like wall charge on this much better I bought t10 assuming more power not knowing of wall charger diff like this better flasher on t10 I think brighter but also more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Walterman

customer_reviews.title: Light only works for a few seconds
customer_reviews.text: This product looks great, seems sturdy and well made and has great functions. Light works and is very bright but only lasts for a few seconds. I charged it under direct sunlight for days to see if that would help, but still only lasted for seconds. I bought it for a trip but didn't work when I needed it and missed the return cut off date so very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Looks to be a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight will be put to good use this winter, but the few times I have already turned it on, it worked very nicely. It is going to take a bit of practice to figure out how to turn the flashlight head on vs. the lighting strip. Once the strip is lit, though, holding the on button down changes it to a red emergency light with flashing feature. The compass, glass breaking extension, and seat belt cutter make this a perfect travel safety tool. I like the solar strip along the handle that is pretty large for the size of the flashlight. Time will tell how the recharge rate goes. Overall, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaryG

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I was so embarrassed, I got this as a birthday gift for my son in law and it does not turn on and will not charge.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Solar charging is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these about a year ago to use as an emergency light. I’ve kept them by my bed to use as a reading light at night to test the battery life and charging ability. The solar charging is terrible, I don’t even bother trying anymore. Definitely wouldn’t trust this product to use during an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold charge
customer_reviews.text: This light is nearly impossible to use . It won’t stay on .. on off switch is hard to find whey you’re in the dark ..doesn’t stay charged .. Bought it for camping and didn’t have an opportunity to use it until the return window had passed.. Sorry that I purchased this !
customer_reviews.author: Lillian W.

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE NON FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: Received a non functional unit. Had very difficult time trying to get hold of any body at the company. Ultimately was able to return . Very disappointed. Ultimately ordered a simple basic flashlight GearLight LED Tactical Flashlight S1000 [2 PACK] from Amazon which has very high ratings.
customer_reviews.author: AKR

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ALBUM
customer_reviews.text: The charger inside the flashlight starting to become unattached day one. A waste. I'm 70, and I'm not driving to a USPS office to mail this back. So I threw out money it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT NY

customer_reviews.title: A COMPASS?!
customer_reviews.text: WOOOWWWW ultimate survival tool to keep in the car. This thing is way more awesome than I expected. It's heavy with a ton of features so if you want like a camping flashlight just get something basic. This has 3 light modes, several bar light modes on the side including flashing bright red... A MAGNET to stick on your car, a seat belt cutter and a COMPASS. The USB charging is rad and shows a solid light when it's done. I'm bringing this camping because it's just too fun to not. It'll have a home in my car for sure. I feel safe owning this and I'm super happy about it. For real.
customer_reviews.author: SrvivlKittsn

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is Questionable
customer_reviews.text: This a well built quality flashlight with one exception - I have had it about 8 months and I really have not even used it - just sitting in indirect sunlight waiting for a need to be used - and the battery is dead and will not recharge. Since that is the point of this flashlight, to be charged by the sun and to be ready to go - this flashlight is worthless. Maybe I just got a bad battery, but I will never know because I can't figure out how to open up the flashlight and replace the battery, and I see no means to contact the maker about this order.
customer_reviews.author: Alan D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my first one. All the sudden it stopped working. I am hoping the replacement does not have this problem, as it is a handy emergency flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 9 months and 3 short flashlight uses
customer_reviews.text: Electricity went out for 6 hours at our house and I went to charge my phone with it, to find nothing on it worked any longer even after setting in sunlight for a charge. Will see if the others I bought as gifts, will be of any use . . . as so far they've only been stored for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michelle Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: All seemed well until I tried charring my iPhone 7 plus, along with many other NON Apple products. It charges for about 2-3 seconds and stops. It may be defective or it is not compatible with the products I own. The lights and strobe work for hours, which tells me it is receiving a charge. On the positive side, the light, strobe, glass breaker and seat belt cutter appear to be of good quality. My advice, buy the Patriot flashlight made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: C. Caffee

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine
customer_reviews.text: I charged it via USB. I think this is a neat gadget that could prove useful one day. It's small, but "weighty" and solar powered. It has a USB adapter located under the compass. Give a slight twist and lift. I really like the charge capability. The different light settings are cool. Depress for 3 different flashlight settings, press and hold for flashing/distress lights. It seems fine. I hope I won't "need" to break glass or cut my own seat belt AT ALL, but if the time comes, I'm expecting this to work. Everything else seems to appear functional. I may get another one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: BizyBee

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly bright, heavy duty, and easy to charge
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight was a pleasant surprise. It is hefty, made of metal so it seems durable, and it takes less light than expected to charge. I've had it facing a window in daylight (but it can't be characterized as direct sunlight - more of an oblique angle) and also in a room with an overhead light - the little green indicator comes on showing it is charging in these conditions that other solar chargers would not. It's great to have multiple flashlight and lamp modes. The alarm is loud. I have not tested the capability to charge my phone yet. Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase and likely to buy more for gifts to keep my family safe.
customer_reviews.author: Johna Dalton

customer_reviews.title: ***A must have for your home, car, boat, camper, etc.  I have just purchased my 8th one.
customer_reviews.text: With all the storms/power outages we are having this is a must. You can charge your phone/tablet, use as a flasher in emergencies, etc. Read the description. I gave everyone one at Christmas and now I give them as thank you presents for dinner or as a guest in someone's home. The price is right, the quality is great, and this day and time you need to be prepared. I will be purchasing more. Try one, you too will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Looney

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight for emergencies in the car and home.
customer_reviews.text: As far as the light is concerned it has been great sun will recharge it I have left it on my dashboard to give it an opportunity and it has not failed me I have also recharged it through the USB as far as the window-breaking or the safety belt cutter I haven't had the opportunity to experiment with but the flashlight works great. It does have an alarm that is super loud and a compass that I have found that points true north. I have bought two one is in my car the other one hangs on the side of my refrigerator through the magnetic magnet on the side of the flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Manning

customer_reviews.title: Does what ya need it to!
customer_reviews.text: Great light, pretty good battery life, well built and good magnets. Would prefer a second button for the side LEDs to separate from main light, and have the flashing sequences consistent, but like them being selectable still. And would be awesome to have a beam focus on main lamp. Kids love to play with the sirens and lights in the house. Overall great light/tool for the price. Image with the two military flags are in pitch black garage 20ft out, no lights, no openings. Works well for lighting up the creek behind the house too.
customer_reviews.author: William McNatt

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising - Flashing Red AND Blue lights. Check your state laws!
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this flashlight, unfortunately I won't have it long enough to test it's durability. Out of the box it works great, however the description states that it has 10 red LEDs. This isn't the case. Both flashlights I ordered came with 5 red and 5 BLUE flashing LEDs. This is illegal in my state, so it's useless to me. I don't know why a company would intentionally mislead people like that, but I'm very disappointed that I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: Complete Garbage
customer_reviews.text: It was barely used, never dropped or mishandled. And still, after about 4 months, it would no longer hold a charge. The light comes on for about 2 seconds and goes out. Nice when it worked, the 3 or 4 times we used it. No sign of a warranty anywhere. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: E. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: My best, most handy flashlight yet!
customer_reviews.text: Solid beam: Bright, less bright, and strobe. Siren: Tested through the cap, thought it was cute, took the cap off and scared the neighbors! LOUD, awesome! Seat belt cutter: Haven't had to test it yet thankfully. Glass breaker, Haven't had to test it yet thankfully. Compass seems pretty accurate. USB Charging worked, haven't tested it's solar charging yet (plastic still on as cover in the pic) This light blew away my expectations for $32. Well deserving of it's high ratings!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Great solar & great so far..
customer_reviews.text: So far, its fantastic. Love the little green light that indicates it's charging (good to know when you're solar charging). Hope it lasts! Update: Still operating as intended. I didn't like the seatbelt cutter and glass breaking spike.. they seemed to get in the way, but the good news is you CAN remove them. (They should advertise this, as I almost didn't buy because of them.) I leave it in the window on the South side of the house capitalizing on free power.
customer_reviews.author: Rands

customer_reviews.title: Gave As A Christmas Gift and The Recipient Liked It Very Much
customer_reviews.text: I gave this flashlight as a christmas gift for someone who fishes at night and they liked it very much. The light is extremely bright, there is a very loud alarm, it also has flashing signal lights that spin red and blue to be easily seen in case of trouble. The solar phone charger worked well and all the rest this "swiss army" flashlight has works good. I think I will be buying more of these as they are very handy in emergencies. We were very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C.Smith

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flashlight for my vehicle if I have a breakdown and night use. I love the durability and it being a solar rechargeable flashlight. I will be purchasing another for my survival/camping bag. I haven’t tested the battery life as yet, stay tuned.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa P

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flashlight to keep in the car. The flashlight is not super bright but does a good job of lighting the area. The red and blue flasher is very bright, one could probably pull another car over. The magnet holds it well and the side light lights the immediate area very well. The best part is solar charging, set it on the dashboard occasionally and it is charged. Don’t know how long a charge lasts, it’s never run down.
customer_reviews.author: Bosqueman

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 and one is junk!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these in March 2020 and hadn't used them for any length of time until September 2020. One seems to be good and the other lasts less than 10 minutes and that is being generous. They were both fully charged too! The one that doesn't last for any length of time also has a bad compass. And of course the time frame for returns has closed... I am not happy with this purchase at all!!! It just makes me wonder how long the other flashlight has before it is reduced to a seat belt cutter and glass breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: This is not as bright as I expected nor is the range. I have a rechargeable head lamp that I compared it to. The head lamp beat it by far. Not a whole lot better than a regular flashlight. The advantage is that it is solar powered and I can charge other devices off of it. For this reason it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a great heavy duty light, many functions
customer_reviews.text: I am a flashlight "geek" and I loved the solid heavy duty feel of this flashlight. Plus the fact that it has so many functions...flashing light, read warning light. Can be charged with solar power or with a USB port, then have it ready to charge your phone in an emergency. I cannot comment on the longevity or the stats on the internal battery, but out of the box I am very pleased. Will make great gifts, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best Flashpoint Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously I love this flash light. It charges easily, super bright, so many settings you will be finding out new settings for days. The flashlight does so many things you usually can't remember them all at once when your telling people about what all it does. The light is like a spot light at night. I will always buy these lights for the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Man

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is the brightest solar flashlight I've ever owned. It has a green light that turns on when charging, and you don't need actual sunlight. Just having it outdoors during the day will charge it. It will charge faster in the sunlight though. The compass is pretty acurate and it has a stong enough magnet on the side that I put it upright on the side of the fride, and it stayed there.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence

customer_reviews.title: Good Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: It's a good flashlight. The light does not extend for a broader view like the other one (different brand) that I have. I was disappointed that it did not arrive on the day promised. I had someone excited and waiting for it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: 15 minutes of use with each charge
customer_reviews.text: The flashlight only works for about 15 minutes with each charge.....not enough time to get around the block with the dog! :(
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bottone

customer_reviews.title: Best flashlight so far!
customer_reviews.text: The best flashlight you could ever buy. Whether you use it indoors or outdoors, the features this flashlight has are amazing! I hope I never have to break any windows or cut any seatbelts open, but definitely a great thing to have. Best of all is that it has a magnet which works especially well when you need to work hands on and can’t hold the flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Zaida

customer_reviews.title: Always pay your insurance
customer_reviews.text: Er, I think I love it. I hope I never have to use it, but it's good to know it's under the seat if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Shari A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this flashlight. I don't keep in my car, but I probably should. It is my favorite reach for flashlight to use in the house. It has a very bright light and keeps a charge for a long time. I use it almost daily, and have not recharged it yet. I have had it about six weeks. I liked it so much I bought more to give as Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline

customer_reviews.title: as described!
customer_reviews.text: as described. I think its very good for the price. light is pretty bright. I can see across my yard, into the trees at night, etc. nice and sturdy. i would be it again. has bright light, click again and it has a slightly lower light, click again and it flashes for emergency alerts. great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: bml

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Father’s Day and my husband is over the moon with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Best light I've owned in years.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic lights! I've ordered 4 of them now and given one away to a co-worker, of a fleet of truck drivers it is by far the best light that any of us has and everyone keeps asking where I got it. Great price, durable, and mostly useful options. The magnet and side light are particularly nice for doing nighttime repairs under or on a big rig.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Gillentine

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: The lights are great, as are the other features. The only issue I have is a small 1. The compass hands are 180° out. Not really a giant deal, as long as you are aware of it and read accordingly. It would be nice if the red lights had a constant on setting instead of just the 2 flashing. Would help with mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice survival flashlight and is high quality. Light is bright but could be brighter. Over all it’s the best flashlight I got.
customer_reviews.author: Phatana Souvanna

customer_reviews.title: Solar flashlights are indispensable!
customer_reviews.text: These lights charge under very low light conditions. You can tell when they are charging by the green light on the handle. They are extremely bright when in use and have many modes of operation. A wonderful purchase for when your old solar flashlight finally wears out after many years.
customer_reviews.author: Norman B. Tweed Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control is Lacking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 13 of these flashlights for members of my family to carry in their automobiles for use in the event of an emergency. 11 functioned as advertised and what I expected for the amount paid for them. However, I had to return 2 as they were defective. Had someone at the factory simply tested them, they would have immediately known they were not working properly. Returning them was simple but should not have been necessary. The replacements were much sooner than I expected. I have no complaints with Amazon but can't say the same for NPET.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff H.

customer_reviews.title: PengXuan - please contact me.  The replacement flashlight is having the same issues!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, You had sent out a replacement flashlight and it is having the same issues as the first one I purchased. After charging it for days in sunlight, this second flashlight still will not hold a charge and the flashlight dims and goes out within just a minute or two. Additionally, the magnet is not strong enough to even hold the flashlight onto a metal surface. Please let me know how I should proceed to get a refund for this defective product. Thank you, Heather
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No battery life
customer_reviews.text: It works great for about 30 minutes but then if you turn on the any flashlight capability it instantly turns off so you have to keep turning it on it’ll stay on for about three seconds. Would I buy again absolutely not and I’m gonna see about a warranty
customer_reviews.author: Newtonnola

customer_reviews.title: Had potential potential ...
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight worked fine when we received, when we tried to used again (after the return window has closed) it was no longer working .
customer_reviews.author: I love CA

customer_reviews.title: wrong cable
customer_reviews.text: Bought flashlight to be able to recharge phone but cable provided does not fit my T-Mobile android phone, Was overcharged. At order site payed $25.99. At website price is $19.00, Can't screw off bottom of flashlight to reveal compass. Can't reach vender by phone must send e-mail.
customer_reviews.author: HMS

customer_reviews.title: Loving my NPET T10 Car Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't even used it in the car. I put this one next to the front door for emergency purposes. The 3 light modes are perfect plus you get the emergency flashing red and blue lights. It also comes with a USB charger built in, super cool. I recommend this to anyone needing and emergency flash light.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Schooley

customer_reviews.title: Pin hole reset button on the USB face.
customer_reviews.text: The Product has a sturdy feel to it. I was concerned with the negative reviews and hope that this won't get buried. The primary issue is with charging and using the power bank function. I experienced this issue in the first minutes out of the box. There is a pin hole reset access in the face of the USB ports. Place a small paper clip end into the available hole and gently depress for a period of 10 seconds and release. The charging and power bank issues should be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Don Lord

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Pros. I like the weight of this flashlight. It seems well built. It's bright enough to make me happy. Con. Have to press the on/off button three times to cycle through the modes to shut it off.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Stracener

customer_reviews.title: Good to have in the car
customer_reviews.text: Everything works as stated, have to check at night for brightness and distance, but it seems rather bright inside. The one thing is the compass .... I would not trust it to steer me correctly ...doesn't 'turn' properly and have to shake it to move.
customer_reviews.author: animal lover

customer_reviews.title: Product A+ Instructions F
customer_reviews.text: Had to watch video review to see how everything works. Lots of features & seems to be a perfect safety item. Only complaint is the accommodating instructions are so tiny a person can’t read without magnifying glass. Please spend the money for larger paper & ink!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: solar recharge takes too long
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have electricity or a larger solar charger and don't lose your USB cord it will recharge fairly quickly. If you rely it's solar power to recharge it takes several days of sunlight according to their instructions. Very bright light, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tod

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: These were given as Christmas gifts so I don't know the longevity of battery life yet but the recipients all loved the practicality of them. Everything worked very well right out of the box without having been charged before opening. GREAT GIFT!
customer_reviews.author: Didi H

customer_reviews.title: Good flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I love the LED bulb and solar charging. The insane flashing modes are not what I want. I don't need those modes so they are just annoying. All else is great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Many great uses in one devise
customer_reviews.text: Love,love this flashlight. It has many uses and charging is so much better than batteries. It also has a USB port which is another great feature. It’s bright and has several levels of light. I definitely made the right purchase with this flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Musik

customer_reviews.title: the compleat flashlight
customer_reviews.text: impressive number of features--too many to list here...just go to product description...from 3 mode front beam to side beam of white and red pulsating hazard light and strobe...to working compass on end...solid construction....and fair price ... in fact a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Function and versatility is too notch.
customer_reviews.text: The function and versatility of this flashlight is great. I use flashlight during my deliverys at night to find addresses and this does the job. Plus with the emergency features, you are set for the just in case. This is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: The creators seemed to put a lot of effort to include every useful thing into this product. The quality is unquestionable. It is in my vehicle and I feel secure to have such a variety of life saving functions in one handy place. It's an awesome gift for anyone you love.
customer_reviews.author: Shy Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: Solar Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really needed it for much yet. I make sure it stays charged and the indicator light for that is a nice green light and is very easy to see. I hope for the need of such a light and it's emergency features to not be needed but I have been prepping for an emergency for 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This flashlight is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I was really, really surprised at the overall quality. They don't make them like this anymore. Well...I guess they do because this company did it. Really bright light. Really, really bright. The case is solidly built, made from aluminum. Feels like you could toss it off a mountain. Just grade A quality. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Comrade Trump

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic multipurpose flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Very durable multipurpose flashlight. Has very good lighting, 500 lumens and best of all, it is solar rechargeable or by electricity. There are various alarms at opposite end which is ear piercing with the cap off! Makes an excellent practical gift. Everyone who received one as a gift likes it a lot! Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Domo

customer_reviews.title: Failed pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product for a couple of weeks. All of the lights worked when I received the unit in March. Now in the beginning of May - the main LED light is not working and when selecting the other light modes, the LEDs on the side of the body only work sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome flashlight! I'm sure planes could see it while we were out camping this weekend. It shoots an awesome beam of light. Much better t han anyflash light ive had and I've had some good ones while I was a home inspector.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Vance

customer_reviews.title: All in one  Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Hoping to see how long battery holds a charge since an emergency tool is generally used in emergencies. Light is brighter than expected but that is great. Came promptly. Seller is conscientious about customer satisfaction. Happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Get one or 5!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. I bought one and loved it so much I bought four more !
customer_reviews.author: Arianastar

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: adding to a previous review handle discoloration and the battery is dead purchased in March 2019 i thought this had a warranty doesn't look like on their website
customer_reviews.author: Russ 78

customer_reviews.title: Dosent last 6 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I 've bought 3 so far none of them stay on for more than 30 mins. they advertise that the light stays on for up to six hours or more. depending on the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Rider

customer_reviews.title: Essential item.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thing to have in many ways. An emergency essential for anybody. Would be a great gift for a female just in case she breaks down and needs to wait for help or make a call on a dead cell. Well built and looks pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great multi purpose flashlight that goes beyond being just a flashlight. It is a great gift idea based on the many functions it offers. We have bought two and have two more on order at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hightower

customer_reviews.title: This is a “Hero” of a light -multi tool at great price
customer_reviews.text: Brite light, great price for this item. Compares well against “road hero”. I charged with solar panel in sun for 9 hours , perfect result.
customer_reviews.author: POFNY

customer_reviews.title: So good I just ordered 2 more as gifts.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile, rugged, charges from the sun or USB, will charge an iPhone, car escape options, bright forward and side lights with multiple settings, compass, and more - seems like a high quality build. I just ordered 2 more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Kassey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Flashlight Never have to worry about batteries
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the Flashlight. It's not small nor is it big, it's just right. I love that it is solar and it has other features like compass, safty hammer, seat belt cutter & Magnet. Nice and Bright too!
customer_reviews.author: Zeffie

customer_reviews.title: This flashlight has great features!
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can charge your phone from the USB port on the bottom of the flashlight handle using the solar powered feature. Good to know that the hammer can break a car window if necessary and that the wire cutter can cut a seat belt. Also nice that it has a built in compass; and a strong magnet to attach it to the underside of a metal hood if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D.

customer_reviews.title: Multi use
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my truck... all the lights are very bright. The charge by solar panel is very cool and it's well constructed
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sheriff

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery; great flashlight
customer_reviews.text: About a month ago I bought 4 of these flashlights for Christmas presents for each in our family for our cars. When we opened up the flashlights we were surprised how well built they were and how bright the light was. 3 out of the four worked great, but one needed to be charged before the light worked. After charging it worked perfectly. Great item to have for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R. Dolen

customer_reviews.title: Came apart.
customer_reviews.text: I went to unscrew the compass so I could plug it in and charge it and the other piece unscrewed with it exposing all the wires. I can't get it back to exactly how it was. So I can't charge it unless I hold the piece which is loose wires to the charger to it which to me is unSafe Too bad it was after my warranty because I would have taken it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: What a great value
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on purchasing this flashlight but if you’re looking at the reviews and comparing it to others I am glad I purchased it. I even ordered extras for home, cars, and work. You can’t beat it
customer_reviews.author: Fear the Reaper

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just received flashlight. Impressed with its features. Some reviews indicate some features stopped working soon after purchase. I only intend to use in car so do not intend much use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: One of my go to items in an emergency! Lots of great features and it's solar powered!!!
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight is sold other places for more $$$. Amazon was the best deal on the web! This little gem has lots of great features and is Handy in ALL SITUATIONS!! 5* 'S,one of my go to torches in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: lenny paxton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this. Looks fine, but have t had an opportunity to use it. Only downside is it came with no instruction booklet explaining how to access all its features.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie P

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: In the past year I have ordered four of these flashlights. Having this item in the car creates a feeling of safety over the spectrum of possible driving incidents. Safety in case of an accident: 1) Ability to smash car windows, 2) Making yourself or vehicle visible at night, 3) Ability to cut seatbelts, 4) Ability to see at night if vehicle lights are inoperable.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Flashlight!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars, but the compass does not work (frozen). Other people mentioned the same problem. In my opinion, if this flashlight had a Zoom Lens, it would be the PERFECT flashlight. As soon as they add the Zoom Lens feature, I will buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Orville Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: Love this flashlight, it's so bright and love that the sun charges it plus the other benefits it has are awesome. I hi bought 2 more after my first one. ( my husband was jealous)I highly recommend this flashlight
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Floyd

customer_reviews.title: WOW this is cool
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a tactical kind of guy and he loves this. Its amazing with lots of options. I bought a few for us to keep in our vehicles. I'm buying more for my kids and our houses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these flashlights. One for me and my husband and the other one for an older gentleman that we know and love. We love this flashlight!!! All the things that it does is AWESOME!! Definitely will recommend it to everyone I know!!
customer_reviews.author: BuddysMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. When not in use, I just keep on my window seal and it stays charged from sun for instant use. Didn't realize how much i needed a flash light.
customer_reviews.author: lynette

customer_reviews.title: Solid practical product
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy so far with this product. We haven't had an opportunity to use it for anything other than a flashlight, but we love the features. We bought each of our children one to carry in their cars "just in case".
customer_reviews.author: NJL

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Ordered two and they are just so functional. They feel heavy and will withstand a few drops. Different light mode is awesome. Of note, remove the compass from flashlight before using. Magnetic on the flashlight throws off the needle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Flashlight is great, bright and last long enough
customer_reviews.text: The Flashlight is great, bright and last long enough. Do Not however relie on the compass, it’s funk and does not point correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my new flashlight
customer_reviews.text: I just got my new flashlight today and it's December 8th I am in love with this plush light it does so much for a little price I have seen these flashlights for $46 I got this song for $20 it's worth the $20 I am going to buy one for my son it has more than you can expect it works perfectly thank you again Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lori nalley

product_meta.title: NPET T09 Solar Flashlight Car Flashlight 268 Lumens LED COB Light USB Rechargeable Tactical Multi-function Torch Emergency Tool with Window Breaker Seat Belt Cutter Compass
feature_bullets: 【7 Working Modes Flashlight】: Headlight (4-6hrs) -High, Medium and Flashing, Side White Lamp (4-7hrs) - High and Medium, Side Red Light (6-7hrs) - Flashing and Slow-flashing; Press the switch to change working mode and long press 3s to change working LED.Its beam can be focused that throws light up to an impressive 700 feet

【Car Emergency Escape Tool】: Features with window breaker break the stuck window and the seat belt cutter to cut the jammed seat belt; bring safe escape in emergencies, having a self defense LED flashlight tactical can help you get out of most sticky situations
【HANDS-FREE】: With a powerful magnet on the side of the flashlight head, you could attach it to the car or other metallic surface to use as a work light, camping lamp or emergency warning light

【Reliable and Necessary】: Flashlight is water resistant & shock resistant for use under the most rugged, emergency condition.It comes with a weather resistant anodized aluminum alloy body, easy to grip, tail with a compass for outdoors; Not just for auto emergencies, also great for working, camping, or hiking as it's designed to withstand lots of abuse

【Rechargeable Emergency Power Bank】: This solar flashlight has a built-in 2000mAh 18650 battery, could be charged with included USB Cable (4-5hrs) or Solar Power (30hrs), using the USB cable to connect your phone with the flashlight （The battery needs to be greater than 20% ）and charging your phone for emergency

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,277 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
